titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Charles L. Hoagland papers, Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research Scientific Staff FA167
titlestmt.author: Gladys Lewis

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-11-01 01:22:34 -0400.

did.unittitle: Charles L. Hoagland papers, Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research Scientific Staff

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted pending permission from Rockefeller University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Types of records include: biographical material, correspondence, bibliographies, and photographs.

did.unittitle: Biographical material
Biographical information includes appointments at RIMR and salary thru 1942
Biographical information. Prepared at Mr. Flinn's, Business Manager, request for Dr. Gasser
Same as July 31 but includes date of death, Aug 2, 1946
Obituary and biographical information prepared at time of Dr. Hoagland's death
Henry Allen Moe, Secretary, The Century Association/ T. M. Rivers? requesting assistance in preparing a memorial for Dr. Hoagland
Rivers/Henry Allen Moe, re Dr. Hoagland biographical and professional information w/enclosure: ca 1946 Aug 2, obituary prepared at time of Dr. Hoagland's death
Thomas M. Rivers, "Charles Lee Hoagland 1907-1946." (To be read before the meeting of the Interurban Clinical Club, Cleveland, Ohio on Dec 5 or 6, 1947)
Bibliographies
In press. Incomplete
Correspondence
Rivers, T. M. /Gasser, H. S. re Hoagland application for position on Dr. Avery's service in the RIMR Hospital, w/Enclosures
Charles Lee Hoagland's application for appointment to RIMR
Letters of recommendation for Hoagland
Ralph Muckenfuss/Rivers
David Barr/Rivers
Gasser, H. S. /Rivers, T. M. re Hoagland's appointment as resident physician at RIMR Hospital beginning Oct 1, 1937
Rivers/Gasser re letter to Dr. Barr re Hoagland
Rivers/Gasser re Hoagland appointment as Resident in Hospital and Associate Physician, beginning July 1, 1939 w/H. S. Gasser acknowledgment, Apr 1, 1939
Edric B. Smith/Hoagland re Article VIII of the By-Laws of the Corporation enclosure
Federal Housing Administration, Kansas City, Mo/RI. Request for information re Hoagland applying for mutual mortgage insurance and E. B. Smith reply, Apr 22, 1940
B. Lupinek/E. B. Smith, re alterations to Rooms 302 to 307, Central Bldg (Founder's) for Dr. Hoagland
Brown, Wheelock, Harris, Stevens, Inc. / E. B. Smith. Request for references on Dr. Hoagland as a proposed tenant w/E. B. Smith reply, Apr 10, 1941
RI Business Manager/Hoagland re Helena Gilder
Estimate of Dr. Hoagland's Laboratory Rooms 301-305 Central Building
Telephone message from Dr. Hoagland re discharge from Naval Reserve as of Dec 31, 1942
Hoagland's Classification Notice (1-C) from Local Board, Selective Service
re Hoagland's appointment as "Civilian Consultant in the Medical Consultants' Division of the Surgeon General's Office -..". Handwritten and typewritten notes
Commanding General, Military District of Washington/RIMR inquiry re Hoagland's employment with 1945 Jan 31 reply on reverse side
Business Manager, RIMR/Hoagland re Daniel H. Labby, Henry G. Kunkel and Max Bovarnick
Secretary, Board of Scientific Directors, RIMR/Hoagland re Hoagland appointment as an editor for JEM
Business Manager/Hoagland, re laboratory budget in Hospital, July 1, 1946-June 30, 1947
Waldo R. Flinn/H. S. Gasser, re Hoagland's serious condition in RI Hospital
Photographs

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Used in 1946 Aug newspaper obituaries for Dr. Hoagland].

did.unittitle: Obituary material
Notes, handwritten and typed, prior to and after Dr. Hoagland's death re funeral arrangements, lists of publications for obituary notices
E. B. Smith/various publications re Hoagland w/Encls: Biographical sketch and photo to: JAMA, Science Service, Science Press

E. B. Smith telegrams re Hoagland's death and services in Carthage, Mo. to: John D. Rockefeller Jr., O. T. Avery, James B. Conant, Ross G. Harrison, Frank L. Horsfall, Warfield T. Longcope, Homer F. Swift, George Whipple w/reply by telegram, 2 Aug 1946 from John D. Rockefeller Jr.
Many handwritten notes re funeral arrangements, place and date of funeral services and persons to be notified [by E. B. Smith?]
Obituaries re Charles L. Hoagland. Newspaper clippings
New York World-Telegram, "Dr. C. L. Hoagland Dies at Age of 39"
New York Sun, "Dr. Hoagland is Dead at 39"
New York Times, "Dr. Hoagland Dies: Rockefeller Aide". and "Hoagland, Charles Lee"
New York Herald Tribune, "Dr. Charles L. Hoagland Dies; On Rockefeller Institute Staff"
Bus. Mgr/John D. Rockefeller Jr. re telegram, flowers, funeral arrangements, Dr. Hoagland's foster parents, Mr. and Mrs. McCawley
Bus Mgr/H. S. Gasser re obituary notice in Sunday, Times and Herald Tribune
James A. Moffett (Patient) /RIMR re Hoagland
Handwritten letters addressed to T. M. Rivers re Hoagland from
Warfield T. Longcope
Julius Neuberger
N. H. Martin
Dan Labby and John D. Rockefeller Jr. w/T. M. Rivers replies, 6 and 8 Aug 1946
H. Gilder/T. M. Rivers re Hoagland
Francis Binkley/T. M. Rivers re Hoagland w/T. M. Rivers replies of Aug 16 and 19
T.M. Rivers, "Charles Lee Hoagland 1907-1946." for inclusion in the Minutes of the Rockefeller Institute Board. Signed E.H.
did.physdesc: 5 pp carbon copy, and duplicated copy pp 5-9

did.unittitle: Sec'y, Board of Scientific Directors, RIMR/Mr. Alfred L. McCawley. Copy of memorial minute to the McCawleys, by T. M. Rivers adopted by RIMR, Bd of Sci Dirs, 18 Jan 1947
Memorial minute by T. M. Rivers to be read before the meeting of the Interurban Clinical Club, Cleveland, Ohio, Dec 5 or 6, 1947
Obituary material. Extra copies of
Biographical sketch of Charles L. Hoagland sent to various publications by E. B. Smith, Business Manager, RIMR
T. M. Rivers, "Charles Lee Hoagland 1907-1946" for inclusion in the Minutes of the RIMR Board of Scientific Directors at meeting held on Jan 18, 1947. Multiple copies
Posthumous correspondence
Credit slip from Perkins Elmer Corp for 1 Flame Photometer - Model 18-#115 for $375.00
Return receipt of insured parcel signed by Mrs. A. L. McCawley. [Possibly items belonging to Dr. Hoagland sent to the McCawley's]
Exchange re payment of royalties owed by Interscience Publishers to estate of Dr. Charles L. Hoagland to Mr. Alfred L. McCawley
